ingredients.ingredient: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into strips
⅓ cup curry powder, or to taste

cookingTips: Sauté onions until soft and golden before adding curry powder to develop the spice flavor
Add chicken strips after releasing onion oils for even coating and better flavor distribution
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on blooming curry powder in oil to enhance flavor, and suggest serving options like rice or naan bread.
